reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 111/06: VARIATION OF TIME IN EFFECT

content.content: 1. The time in effect, as fixed by subsection 2 (4) of the Act, is varied so that, (a) daylight saving time shall be in effect during the period between 2 a.m. standard time on the second Sunday in March and 2 a.m. daylight saving time on the first Sunday in November; and (b) standard time shall be in effect during the rest of the year. O. Reg. 111/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The time in effect, as fixed by subsection 2 (4) of the Act, is varied so that,

(a) daylight saving time shall be in effect during the period between 2 a.m. standard time on the second Sunday in March and 2 a.m. daylight saving time on the first Sunday in November; and

(b) standard time shall be in effect during the rest of the year. O. Reg. 111/06, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 111/06, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 111/06, s. 2.

Français
